goals.question: What is the distribution of population in London?
goals.rationale: This visualization will help us understand the spread of population across London and identify any outliers or areas with high population density.

goals.question: What is the average rent in different boroughs of London?
goals.visualization: Bar chart of average rent by borough
goals.rationale: This visualization will help us compare the average rent in different boroughs of London and identify any areas with significantly higher or lower rent than the average.

goals.question: What is the relationship between crime rate and population density in London?
goals.visualization: Scatter plot of crime rate vs population density
goals.rationale: This visualization will help us understand if there is any correlation between crime rate and population density in London. It will also help us identify any areas with high crime rate and low population density or vice versa.

goals.question: What is the distribution of green spaces in London?
goals.visualization: Map of green spaces in London
goals.rationale: This visualization will help us understand the spread of green spaces across London and identify any areas with low green space density. It will also help us identify any areas with high green space density that can be used for recreational activities.

goals.question: What is the distribution of public transportation options in London?
goals.visualization: Map of public transportation options in London
goals.rationale: This visualization will help us understand the spread of public transportation options across London and identify any areas with low accessibility to public transportation. It will also help us identify any areas with high accessibility to public transportation that can be used for commuting or transportation purposes.

code:
import seaborn as sns
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

def plot(data: pd.DataFrame):
    data = data.dropna(subset=['population'])
    sns.histplot(data=data, x='population', kde=True, color='blue')
    plt.axvline(data['population'].mean(), color='red', linestyle='dashed', linewidth=1, label='Mean')
    plt.legend()
    plt.title('What is the distribution of population in London?', wrap=True)
    return plt;

chart = plot(data)

import seaborn as sns
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

def plot(data: pd.DataFrame):
    data = data.groupby('borough').mean().reset_index()
    sns.barplot(x='borough', y='rent', data=data)
    plt.title('What is the average rent in different boroughs of London?', wrap=True)
    return plt;

chart = plot(data)

import seaborn as sns
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

def plot(data: pd.DataFrame):
    data['population_density'] = data['population'] / data['area']
    sns.scatterplot(x='population_density', y='crime_rate', data=data)
    plt.title('What is the relationship between crime rate and population density in London?', wrap=True)
    return plt;

chart = plot(data)

import seaborn as sns
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

def plot(data: pd.DataFrame):
    data = data.dropna(subset=['geometry'])
    fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(10,10))
    sns.scatterplot(x='geometry', y='geometry', data=data, hue='green_space', size='green_space', sizes=(50, 500), legend=False, ax=ax)
    ax.set_xlabel('Longitude')
    ax.set_ylabel('Latitude')
    ax.set_title('What is the distribution of green spaces in London?')
    return plt;

chart = plot(data)

import seaborn as sns
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

def plot(data: pd.DataFrame):
    data = data.dropna(subset=['modes'])
    data = data.explode('modes')
    data = data.groupby(['modes']).size().reset_index(name='counts')
    sns.set_style("whitegrid")
    chart = sns.barplot(x='modes', y='counts', data=data, palette='Blues_d')
    chart.set_xticklabels(chart.get_xticklabels(), rotation=45, horizontalalignment='right')
    plt.title('What is the distribution of public transportation options in London?', wrap=True)
    return plt;

chart = plot(data)
